body.name: Nutrichef 18 Quart Convection Countertop Air Fryer - See through Glass for Best Cooking Results - Air Fryer, Roaster, Bake, Grill, Steam & Roast - Includes Glass Bowl, Broil Rack & Toasting Rack
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 6 hrs 50 mins
features: BEST APPLIANCE FOR EASY ACCESS: Small enough to fit on your countertop or table top but large enough to create meals for the whole family. The convection oven countertop cooker comes with an extra wide cooking glass bowl that can hold up to 18 quarts

HEALTHY MEAL PREP: Healthy cooking made easy. Temperature & time-setting adjustable. Air fryer eliminates the need for extra oil. Healthy options are limitless - Cook, Bake, Grill, Steam Broil, Roast & Air-Fry

FASTER MEALS: The best countertop convection oven for a faster cooking time as compared to conventional ovens. Lab-tested to ensure accuracy and speed. Saves you time in the kitchen without sacrificing taste

EFFECTIVE & EVEN COOKING: High temperatures & built-in fan circulates air for moist & savory meals. Cooks thoroughly & retains distinct ingredient flavor. Up to an hour's worth of cooking time. Perfect for meats, steak, pork, chicken, vegetables & more

HASSLE FREE & CONVENIENT: Effortlessly enjoy your cooking experience with our hassle-free and convenient features Our easy to-use rotary controls, two wire cooking racks, and plate tongs allow for seamless preparation plating of your favorite dishes
body.description: Features: - Hassle-Free Electric Convection Oven Cooker - Ability to Cook, Bake, Grill, Steam Broil, Roast & Air-Fry! - Built-in Fan Circulates Air for Effective & Even Cooking - Super-High Temperature Food Prep for Moist & Savory Meals - Smart Meal Prep: Healthy Cooking without Adding Any Extra Oil - Lab Tested to Prepare Meals Faster than Conventional Ovens - Cooks Thoroughly & Retains Flavor for All Inserted Ingredients - Temperature & Time-Setting Adjustable - Large Capacity, Extra Wide Cooking Glass Bowl - Removable Heating Oven Top Lid - High-Powered Heating Element - Convenient Tabletop Design - LED Indicator Lights - Easy-to-Use Rotary Controls - Automatic Power-Off When Timer Expires - Safe for Placement on Any Counter / Tabletop - Easy-to-Clean & Heat Resistant Glass Cooking Bowl - Perfect for Meats, Steak, Pork, Chicken, Vegetables & More! What's in the Box: - Convection Oven - Glass Bowl - Tabletop Stand - Height Extending Insert - (2) Tiered Cooling Racks - Tongs Technical Specs: - Cooker Type: Convection Oven - Heating Element Power: 1200 Watt - Food Capacity: 18+ Quarts - Max. Temperature Reached: 480 ºF Fahrenheit - Max. Time Setting: Up to 60 Minutes - Power Cable Length: 3.28' Ft. - Power: 120V - Product Dimension (L x W x H): 16.1'' x 12.2'' x 13.0'' -inches

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us NutriChef was created on the principle that healthy home cooking should be attainable to all, regardless of skill level and economic status. Starting in 2014, we noticed the disconnect in our lives and in the lives of those around us. We were so busy, always rushing forward, and our health and personal lives suffered. We needed to find some way to slow down and put our health first, all without sacrificing convenience or taste. Could we somehow create healthier versions of our favorite foods, easily in our own kitchens? The answer was a resounding yes, and NutriChef was born.

Our brand was created out of a desire to provide an alternative to fast food convenience and reintroduce people to home cooking. A healthy home-cooked meal is what brings families and friends together. We believe strongly in the value of simple pleasures. An evening spent cooking and sharing a meal of wholesome, nourishing foods is a memory in the making. Today, we have built upon our original mission and now in addition offer products that make the art of entertaining a simpler one. Entertaining and hosting family and friends are one of the great joys of life. Why waste a moment stuck in the kitchen? We offer products that free you up to socialize, while never sacrificing quality or taste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Air Fryer
reviews.reviewText: This air fryer is really easy to clean. Nice large clear area to cook in and easy to use. It does a fantastic job of cooking food.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have a similar one very old and the numbers were off. I bought one more modern with the drawer and I don’t like it because I can’t see it under hard to clean. So I just purchased this one and really like it so easy to use and see as your food Brown’s or cooks and it’s so easy to just take the top off and wash the glass bottom. Love it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars 18-qt Air Fryer for an AWESOME price!!!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great product! I love the 18-quart capacity, the large glass bowl so I can see if my meat is done plus an extender ring - all for an awesome price! May not have the bells and whistles but it does a great job... simplicity works best!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Heat control calibration
reviews.reviewText: Quiet performance but temperature control is not well calibrated. My temperature set knob reads 20" F low according to my oven thermeter.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Satisfied with delivery but doesn't work after first trial.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It came in all pieces and it's fully functional with all the extra add ons. Will let you know how well it steam broils and bakes cheesecake 😊 it goes to its highest temp in 2-3 minutes and the fan does its job well enough. Manual was helpful in letting me know how to wash it to get rid of that new smell.Update: it stopped working after that first trial. I don't know what happened. Power light is on but the rods aren't heating up and the heat fans won't turn on.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GLASS SO YOU CAN WATCH AS IT COOKS
reviews.reviewText: I really like the size,big enough toMake 6 or 8 peirogies. I look forwardto making chicken and burgers.I will also try frozen raviolis.Itlooks to be much easier to cleanthan my older air fryer.This air fryer cooks better too.I have only had it for a couple ofdays but so far so great! I'll add tothis when I cook some more items...but I think you can make almostanything in it!Sweet potatoes both frozen and freshI am going to try many more itemsin this fryer. It also looks cool onmy counter!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I just tested this product for about an hour and it works well. It is easy to use and the dial settings are very clear unlike the other one I had from another company. I would recommend this product is easy to use and cooks well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product for the price
reviews.reviewText: There is a wide price range in this category and you certainly get a lot for your money with this!
